column4: Hi everyone. I'm still searching for a webcam that works with Intrepid Ibex out of the box. I have bought and returned 5 cameras so far. Can anyone suggest a camera that they have working with 8.10?
Thanks ActionParsnip: I have used this list to choose the cameras that haven't worked so far. Can't find any that claim to work with 8.10
thats all i know, you may want to peruse forums etc, I think all webcams will need some work
It shouldn't be the way :( Thanks for the advice however.
